item.title: Fuck sake! arg! stupid! "fixed"
item.dc:creator: @The_cook_from_runesc The cook from runescape
item.description:
@The_cook_from_runesc wrote:

They can’t all be there or it would be working. Keep looking and re-space the code in the bits you changed so it’s consistent. Bracket errors stand out like fuck if it’s all well tabbed.

Read full topic

item.title: Fuck sake! arg! stupid! "fixed"

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Count the braces in the code slowly and carefully and make sure you haven’t misplaced any.

item.title: Fuck sake! arg! stupid! "fixed"
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

OH My God!! Im pissed off now… Ive had to add skill capes ALL OVER AGAIN when i reach 99 in any skill. Just finished it. Well, now i get 100 errors, and i don’t know if im missing {/} or the actual command is wrong! Because theres 20 of them!!

Please help me! Also, i think we will need Team Viewer!

So, if you are willing to help, add me on

tweezy@hotmail.co.uk

Im on msn now, then we can get Team Viewer on!!

Thanks in advance!

~Johno

[code]
if (playerLevel[0] == 99) {
sendFrame164(6206);
sendFrame246(6210, 290, 2678);
sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you have reached 99 attack!”, 6207);
sendFrame126(“You are now Master of the Attacks!”, 6208);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just got 99 attack!";
addItem(14074, 1);
addItem(14075, 1);
addItem(15334, 1);
}
